Pre-Game Insights: Wales are under the guidance of a new manager Craig Bellamy
Turkey reached the quarter-finals of Euro 2024, their best tournament performance in over 15 years
Miscellaneous Highlights: This game will be televised live to all UK viewers on SC4
Others: Wales are coming off a 4-0 hammering at the hands of Slovakia
Turkey's most recent game was a 2-1 loss to the Netherlands in the quarter-final of Euro 2024
